name: api_ticketPost
description:
This commands adds the content parameter as a response/reply to an existing
* ticket specified by ticketID.

function.name: api_ticketPost
function.desc: This commands adds the content parameter as a response/reply to an existing ticket specified by ticketID.

sid.name: sid
sid.description: the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

ticketID.name: ticketID
ticketID.description: the id of the ticket to add a response to. you can use [getTicketList](#getticketlist) to get a list of your tickets

content.name: content
content.description: the message to add to the ticket
content.example: Heres an update to my ticket

input_comment:
* @param sid string the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call
* @param ticketID string the id of the ticket to add a response to. you can use [getTicketList](#getticketlist) to get a list of your tickets
* @param content string the message to add to the ticket
